official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Ky., comprising the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area, as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Kentucky, comprising the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area, as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Ky., comprising the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area, as wilderness.
